realist.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who accepts that things are not always perfect, and deals with problems or difficult situations in a practical way
realist.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She had always been a realist, not a dreamer.
realist.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a writer, painter etc who shows or describes things, especially unpleasant things, as they really are in life
